title: Remove "Variable" from torch.cat error message
body_html:
>>> import torch
>>> import numpy as np
>>> torch.cat((np.ones((5,5)), np.zeros((5,5))),1)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
TypeError: expected Variable as element 0 in argument 0, but got tuple

initially reported from https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/bad-error-message/19828

>>> import torch

initially reported from https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/bad-error-message/19828
body:
```
>>> import torch
>>> import numpy as np
>>> torch.cat((np.ones((5,5)), np.zeros((5,5))),1)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
TypeError: expected Variable as element 0 in argument 0, but got tuple
```
